entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
